Text: The English Setter is a medium size breed of dog.

<Text: English Setter:  The mainly white body coat is of medium length with long silky fringes on the back of the legs, under the belly and on the tail.>

Text: English Setter:  The coat features flecks of colour, and the different colour varieties are referred to as belton.
